title: Shimla-Kufri Road Partially Closed
description: Road repair work ongoing between Mall Road junction and Kufri. Expect delays of 30-45 minutes. Alternate route via Chharabra available but adds 20 minutes to journey. Work expected to complete by November 30th.

title: Light Rain Expected This Weekend
description: Meteorological department forecasts light to moderate rainfall on November 23-24. Temperature may drop to 8°C. Carry umbrellas and warm layers. Roads may become slippery, drive carefully. Beautiful post-rain views expected!

title: Winter Carnival at The Ridge
description: Annual Winter Carnival happening at The Ridge from November 25-28. Cultural performances, local food stalls, and handicraft exhibition. Free entry. Expect increased crowds near Mall Road and Ridge area during evening hours (5 PM - 9 PM).

title: Jakhu Ropeway Maintenance
description: Jakhu Ropeway will be closed for annual maintenance on November 26-27. Trek route to Jakhu Temple remains open. Alternative: Take taxi to base and trek remaining distance (approximately 1 km uphill).

title: Goa Swell Advisory
description: IMD predicts 1.8 m swell height along Ashwem–Arambol between Nov 24-26. Strong rip currents during afternoon high tide. Surf early mornings and avoid swimming in flagged zones.

title: NH66 Night Diversion
description: Mumbai–Goa Highway (NH66) shut 10 PM–5 AM near Poladpur ghat for rockfall mitigation until Dec 5. Daytime traffic open but speed restricted.

title: Rohtang Permit Cap Reached
description: Daily tourist permit quota for Rohtang Pass hit by 8 AM. Apply online a day earlier or shift to Hamta circuit. Snow chain mandatory after KM 32.

title: Spiti Route Black Ice Warning
description: Night lows at -8°C around Kunzum La causing early morning black ice. Two-wheelers advised to cross after 9 AM once BRO clears frost.

title: Shillong Skies Clear
description: After a week of showers, skies turning clear from Oct 20. Perfect window for Dawki river kayaking and Laitlum photography.

title: Desert Folk Nights
description: Sam Sand Dunes hosting night folk concerts + astronomy walk Nov 27-30. 800 seats only; book via RTDC counters.
